mapper.select: SELECT member_email memberEmail, member_name memberName, account_kind accountKind, member_reputation memberReputation, member_location memberLocation, member_phone memberPhone, member_link memberLink, member_gender memberGender, member_about memberAbout, member_birth memberBirth, member_date memberDate, member_state memberState FROM dev_member WHERE member_email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') AND member_state = 'N' ORDER BY member_email LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dev_member WHERE member_email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') AND member_state = 'N'
SELECT member_email memberEmail FROM dev_member WHERE member_email = #{memberEmail}
mapper.update: UPDATE dev_member SET member_state = 'Y' WHERE member_Email = #{memberEmail}
